title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JavaScript libraries for downloading and running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings; chat, generate, create, push, delete, and list models with native Python objects.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components for RAG & agent pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint, markdown, code highlighting.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, prompt templates, and shell completion.

title: chatd: Ollama Slack Bot
summary: Slack bot that forwards channel/DM messages to a local Ollama model and streams replies back into Slack threads.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension using Ollama for local code completion and inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j – Java Client
summary: Lightweight Java/Kotlin library for chat, generate, pull, and embed endpoints with builder-style API.

title: ollama-rb – Ruby Gem
summary: Official Ruby client wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports chat, generate, and model management.

title: ollama-csharp/.NET
summary: Community-maintained C# client library and ASP.NET Core integration for local LLM inference via Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC, and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with examples for docker-compose, CUDA, and ROCm runtimes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for building local retrieval-augmented pipelines.

title: ollama-rag – Streamlit Demo
summary: Minimal Streamlit app showing RAG with Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Llama-2-chat for answers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that listens to slash commands and streams Ollama model responses into channels.

title: ollama-npm – Unofficial JS wrapper
summary: Community npm package exposing typed REST wrappers for chat, generate, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-py on PyPI
summary: Official Python package maintained by Ollama team; zero-dependency client for local LLM inference.

title: Reddit: r/ollama – Model discussion thread
summary: Community roundup of newly supported models (Mistral 0.3, Gemma 1.5) and performance benchmarks on Apple Silicon.

title: Hacker News: Show HN – Ollama
summary: Launch discussion covering architecture choices (Go + llama.cpp), licensing, and roadmap toward multi-modal models.
